href.description: Sets the href. When set will render the component as an anchor tag.

icon.description: An optional icon. Nested inline with the text when provided.

isIconOnly.description: Whether or not the button should only display as an icon.

isBlock.description: Whether or not the button should display as a block.

isCompact.description: Whether or not the button has reduced padding

isDisabled.description: Whether or not the button should be disabled.

isReversed.description: Reverses the position of the icon and text.

onMouseDown.description: Callback function triggered when mouse is pressed.

onBlur.description: Callback function triggered when button loses focus.

onFocus.description: Callback function triggered when button gains focus.

onKeyDown.description: Callback function triggered when key is pressed.

onKeyUp.description: Callback function triggered when key is released.

refCallback.description: Callback ref to pass into the dom element.

text.description:
Sets the button text.
If the button is `isIconOnly` or variant `utility` this text is set as the aria-label and title for accessibility.

title.description:
Additional information to display as a native tooltip on hover.
Buttons declared as `isIconOnly` or `utility` will fallback to using `text` if not provided.

type.description: Sets the button type. One of `button`, `submit`, or `reset`.

variant.description: Sets the button variant. One of `neutral`,  `emphasis`, `ghost`, `de-emphasis`, `action` or `utility`.
